item2:
可查询所有T/R数据
Query all T/R data
item4:
SAP下传相关Transfer Requirement Data
SAP download related Transfer Requirement Data
item5:
Article No, GTIN No, Reqmt. No；或挑选指定的T/R数据
Article No, GTIN No, Reqmt. No; or select specific T/R data
输出
item6:
T/R相关数据
T/R related data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的T/R数据，系统将提示查无此T/R信息
If there is no eligible T/R data, the system will prompt to check that there is no such T/R information
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选Article No后点选Query查询T/R数据
Enter query conditions or select Article No and click Query to query T/R data
2. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
3. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
